interface.mode: Should be 'ROOT' or 'BRANCH' or 'LEAF'. Root = starting, conects to main wifi | Branch = Connects between Root & Leaf, also works as end points | Leaf = End points
interface.name: Proposed interfae Name, AP name as well
interface.index: -1 if no index, 0 -> N for 1 -> (N+1) index
interface.parentName: <parent interface name, wifi SSID if mode=ROOt>
